item.title: Where Humane Failed, Qualcomm Imagines the Future Is Filled With AI Pins
item.description: Qualcomm imagines a future packed with AI wearables. We still have to find a gadget that makes AI worth the hassle.

item.title: I wear the Ultrahuman Ring Air every day, which makes me very excited to try the much-improved Ring Pro
item.description: The new Ultrahuman Ring Pro has been released with better sensors, better battery and a feature-filled charging case — not to mention a much higher price.

item.title: NYT Connections hints today: Clues, answers for March 2, 2026
item.description: Connections is a New York Times word game that's all about finding the "common threads between words." How to solve the puzzle.
